# tg_node (Data Source)

Fetches a node from Trustgrid either by UID or FQDN



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `fqdn` (String) Node FQDN
- `timeout` (Number) Timeout for node to become available
- `uid` (String) Node UID

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
